path.style: stroke-width: 4px; stroke: rgb(252, 205, 255); paint-order: fill; fill: rgba(216, 216, 216, 0);

text.style: fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-size: 34.4px; stroke-width: 1px; stroke: rgb(252, 205, 255); white-space: pre;
fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); stroke-width: 1px; stroke: rgb(252, 205, 255);font-size: 38.6px; text-anchor: middle; white-space: pre;
